content: I don't have personal preferences, emotions or feelings. however, some of the most popular and sacred pilgrimage sites in buddhism are the four great pilgrimage sites - bodh gaya, sarnath, kusinara, and lumbini - which are associated with significant events in the life of the buddha. other notable pilgrimage sites include mount kailash, mount wutai, and the diamond mountains. these sites are believed to be imbued with the blessings of various bodhisattvas and are often associated with great masters of vajrayana buddhism. ultimately, the choice of pilgrimage site may depend on one's personal beliefs, interests, and spiritual goals.
